text: i am Ravi Readyi I'm part of a worldwide
grocery stores tech team at Amazon
Amazon groceries are operated in
different ways One we deliver Amazon
groceries through Amazon.com But we also
deliver groceries through our physical
formats like Amazon Fresh Whole Foods
and Amazon Go So we have recently
migrated entire enterprise uh business
intelligence tool that was used by all
of our whole 500 stores to quicksite We
were able to improve the dashboard load
time performance by 90% Which means that
users in the past would spend a minute
and in some cases you know more than 5
minutes to bringing down uh the average
load time to under 6 seconds And this
across 500 stores and use it by
thousands of users it translates to tens
of thousands of hours saved for the
business Saving thousands of hours for
the you know business users in waiting
for uh the data and the reports to show
up We are you know freeing their time to
be able to focus on the customer needs
uh as opposed to you know worrying about
a technical platform Our vision for the

generative AI tools really simplify the
insight generation as a whole in a way
that we're not spending too much time
figuring out building you know pipelines
figuring out you know how to generate
the insight how to deep dive the data
instead we're trying to you know get all

generative AI capability in a way that
we are you know mainly focusing on what
actions Can we take you know quickly you
